item.title: Former President Joe Biden diagnosed with 'aggressive' form of prostate cancer
item.description: The cancer has metastasized to the bone, according to the former president's personal office.

item.title: Polish centrist's narrow presidential lead leaves pro-EU path in balance
item.description: Polish liberals performed worse than expected in a presidential election on Sunday, an exit poll showed.

item.title: House Speaker Mike Johnson stresses importance of Memorial Day deadline as 'historic' budget bill heads for revote
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson expressed optimism that the budget bill would reach the House floor before Memorial Day as lawmakers prepare to vote at 10 p.m. S...

item.title: Former VP Mike Pence calls the $400 million Qatari jet gift 'a bad idea' that Trump should turn down
item.description: Trump's plan to accept the lavish Qatari jumbo jet, a Boeing 747-8, and convert it to be used as Air Force One has sparked fierce controversy.

item.title: TrumpÂ says he will call Putin, Zelenskyy, and NATO members on Monday to talk ceasefire, trade
item.description: Trump told reporters on Friday that he would speak with Putin after the Russian president skipped peace talks between Russia and Ukraine in Turkey.
